mapper.select: select * from noepa.hackathon_Er order by Er_id desc
mapper.update: update noepa.hackathon_Er set Er_title = #{Er_title}, Er_contents = #{Er_contents} where Er_id = convert((select Er_id from (SELECT Er_id FROM noepa.hackathon_Er where Er_writer=#{Er_writer} Limit #{Er_id},1) Er_id), signed);
update noepa.hackathon_member set mb_pw = #{mb_pw}, mb_name = #{mb_name} where mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.select: select * from noepa.hackathon_info order by info_id desc
mapper.update: update noepa.hackathon_info set info_title = #{info_title}, info_contents = #{info_contents} where info_id = convert((select info_id from (SELECT info_id FROM noepa.hackathon_info where info_writer=#{info_writer} Limit #{info_id},1) info_id), signed);
